metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28007 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Execution with Unnecessary Privileges. Because Exim operates as root in the log directory (owned by a non-root user), a symlink or hard link attack allows overwriting critical root-owned files anywhere on the filesystem.

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
